frontmatter.title: Becoming
frontmatter.description: Michelle Obama encourages us to adopt a growth mindset: to become a better version of ourselves everyday. Her voice is so authentic and inspires readers to own their life story.

frontmatter.title: The Call To Courage
frontmatter.description: Bren√© Brown: Call to Courage is a Netflix Original based on her eponymous book. In this TED talk-like documentary, she teaches how courage and vulnerability are more intertwined than we would think.
